Paragraph: CONCLUSION : Our data indicate that long - term use of nonaspirin analgesic drugs and NSAIDs is not associated with an increased risk of ESRD .

| --- |
| ESRD (End Stage Renal Disease) |

In the given paragraph, the disease entity is "ESRD", which stands for End Stage Renal Disease.

In the revised analysis, the only disease entity identified is "ESRD", which stands for End Stage Renal Disease. The term "nonaspirin analgesic drugs" and "NSAIDs" are drug categories and not diseases.

Paragraph: CONCLUSION : Our data indicate that long - term use of nonaspirin analgesic drugs and NSAIDs is not associated with an increased risk of ESRD .

| --- |
| nonaspirin analgesic drugs |
| NSAIDs (which stands for Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs) |
| ESRD (which stands for End-Stage Renal Disease, a medical condition, not a chemical) |

Note: ESRD is a medical condition, not a chemical. However, I included it in the table to show that it was mentioned in the text.
